title: Still didn't get the Mistery Gift from Riot Kayle event !
body: Still didn't get the Mistery Gift from Riot Kayle event ! Heelp

replies.body: i didn't get it. all i got is the icon
Well i made a ticket to Riot ,and they gave me the mistery gift <3 you should do the same ! :)
No worries, we'd be happy to help!  Reach out to us in a ticket and we can find out what happened!  We'll respond as soon as possible and make sure you have your goodies!
